description: Try our easy to follow Lemon-Roasted Chicken with Sweet Potato Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lemon-Roasted Chicken with Sweet Potato Mash
name: Lemon-Roasted Chicken with Sweet Potato Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide tomatoes into 4 sprigs. Place onto a baking tray and spray with cooking spray. Roast for 20 minutes or until tender. Serve chicken with sweet potato mash, asparagus and roasted tomatoes. Season to taste with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper.
